[vc_row type="vc_default" full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="15359" img_size="full" style="vc_box_shadow_3d"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Educating children for life

We help children, including the most vulnerable, access quality education and attain functional levels of literacy, numeracy and essential life skills. When children can read, they can better advocate for their rights and help provide for their families.

World Vision uses a lifecycle approach in our programmes that focuses on the needs of children at all stages of development: early childhood, basic education, and adolescence and youth.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

TIME IS MONEY

Don’t waste your time designing a presentation when you could be closing deals. Quickly update our template with your own text and numbers to have a professional sales deck without spending hours in front of the computer.

ONE-STOP SOLUTION

You’re a professional salesperson. There’s no fooling you; you know a good deal when you see one. And this is a great deal! With 46 fully customizable slides, the Sales Deck Presentation Template features slides formatted with everything you need to win your client over with your solution. Slides feature 29 professional icons (no gimmicky stock photos), budget breakdowns, flow charts, graphs, timelines, maps, and more.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][info_list style="hexagon" icon_bg_color="#1e73be" icon_color="#ffffff" font_size_icon="40" eg_br_style="none"][info_list_item list_title="test2" list_icon="Defaults-search"]46 unique presentation slides designed by professionals that you can easily edit and fill out with your personal content.[/info_list_item][info_list_item list_title="Test1" list_icon="Defaults-book"]46 unique presentation slides designed by professionals that you can easily edit and fill out with your personal content.[/info_list_item][/info_list][info_list font_size_icon="24" eg_br_width="1"][/info_list][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_text_separator title="Related Vacational Education and Training " border_width="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_blog_masonry post_type="tags" layout="gradient_overlay" bwb_columns="desktop:3|h_tablet:3|v_tablet:2|phone:1" dis_posts_total="3" tags="41, 11"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="15445" img_size="full" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle_2"][vc_custom_heading text="Linda Mullen" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]

Team size and team composition affect team processes and team outcomes.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="15447" img_size="full" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle_2"][vc_custom_heading text="Thomas Wood" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]

Team members normally have different roles, like team leader and agents.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="15448" img_size="full" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle_2"][vc_custom_heading text="Karen Polski" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]

Large teams can divide into subteams according to need.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_single_image image="15424" img_size="full" alignment="center" style="vc_box_circle_2"][vc_custom_heading text="Teddy Bear" font_container="tag:h4|text_align:center" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_column_text]

The more homogeneous the group, the more cohesive it will be.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
